author: Sam-Harper
body:
#### PR description:
This PR updates the HLT database connection parameters which are now case sensitive with the latest db upgrade. 

Note I think we all agree  having this in the release is not great  and a better solution should be found. However it is what we have right now

will need to be backported. 

#### PR validation:

hltGetConfiguration works for the adg and offline databases

```
hltGetConfiguration adg:/cdaq/physics/Run2018/2e34/v2.1.7/HLT/V3
hltGetConfiguration /frozen/2016/25ns15e33/v4.2/HLT
```
title: Update HLT Database Parameters: 12_0_X
